title: "Tails" From The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/7/17
itunes:title: "Tails" From The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/7/17
description:
George Noory and psychic medium Kristy Robinett discuss her findings into whether or not pets have a soul, and how they can still communicate with their owners after passing away.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
